Being a Blavatnik
fellow certainly

increases your confidence
from the second
you walk into the room.

Among the people who matter,
Blavatnik is a household name.

And when they hear that
it's this fellowship

program at Harvard Business
School for Entrepreneurship,
they take it very seriously.

Fellowship has taught
me a lot, that it

can be lonely on

making all these
decisions, but being

able to talk to other Fellows

and how they're

the Blavatnik Fellowship has
helped me in a lot of ways.

And it's helped me first
as an entrepreneur.

It's also helped me feel
good about my confidence
and my credibility.

This past year has allowed me to

to be able to have
time with family.

Being a mom and being
a female entrepreneur,

I think sometimes is tough when
you're trying to balance both.

The fellowship has

The fellowship represents
a sandbox here,

One of the biggest

Without the structure of

My hope is that
